sentences.en: They learned to accept their stepmother in time.
sentences.cn: 过了一段时间之后他们学会了接受他们的继母。

sentences.en: She feared losing her inheritance to her stepmother.
sentences.cn: 她担心她的遗产会落到继母的手里。

sentences.en: He raced to pick up the life jackets while his stepmother sent out a Mayday call.
sentences.cn: 他的继母发出无线电求救信号，他飞跑着去拿救生衣。
